hbase generic search

The hbase generic search panel allows generic searching of connected HBase databases. It sends requests directly to the HBase. It searches for data following several paterns. First three criteria are exclusive.

  • Exact key: Searching for just one row specifying its exact key. Very fast search.
  • Prefix key: Searching for rows with keys matching specified string as a prefix.
  • Search columns: Searching for rows with several columns matching specified strings as substrings. The request should have format family:column:value[:comparator],......
  • Show columns: Get only specified columns. This field is compatible with any other criterium. The request should have format family:column,...... * will give all columns.
  • Limit
    • limits number of rows to be demanded.
  • From, Till
    • limits search to a specific time interval (of data entries into database).
